page.title: 07Leisure Organisations.
page.content: In our area we have an open air swimming pool. This year it opened on the 10th of May to the 6th of September 7 days a week.At the swimming pool people can buy refreshments and things to borrow to play with in the pool. Most people in our area use the pool occassionally. There are leisure facilites in Willington and Bishop Auckland, but it is too far to travel for most people, but there is a new one opening up in Eastgate so people can use it. There are Scouts,Cubs,Guides and Brownies and there are 5 youth clubs. The youth clubs have pool,snooker,table tennis,basket ball and refreshments. There is also a Silver Band,Tennis club,Football Team,dancing club for children,Keep Fit classes and Stanhope Choral Society.
